local_intent: Detect and align to the Pepsi can, compute a pinch grasp pose, execute the grasp, and verify stability.
assumptions: Gripper is already open from prior steps
Pepsi can is visible and reachable
coherence_with_global: Matches the global grasp phase: DetectObject -> ApproachAndAlign -> ComputeGraspPose -> GraspAtPose -> IsGraspStable.
